Text: The Duchy of Bernstadt (German: "Herzogtum Bernstadt" , Polish: "Księstwo bierutowskie" , ) was a Silesian duchy centred on the city of Bernstadt (present-day Bierutów) in Lower Silesia (now in Poland) and formed by separation from the Duchy of Oels (Oleśnica).
Triplets:<The Duchy of Bernstadt
2:
--------------------
<Text: Duchy of Bernstadt:  In 1495 it and the Duchy of Oels passed to the Dukes of Münsterberg, who came from the House of Poděbrady.>

Triplets:<Duchy of Bernstadt
3:
--------------------
Text: Duchy of Bernstadt:  In 1647 the Duchy of Bernstadt passed by marriage to the Dukes of Württemberg.
